pages.title: Windstorm Manatite
pages.text: A Manatite attuned to Air with Runes of Air.$(br)A Ring forged with this Manatite will grant the wearer a boost to its jumping height and will slow any fall the user decides. When used in a staff the caster can hasten and reinvigorate people in a radius.
$(l)Ring Effects$()$(br)$(li)Passive: Jump Boost III$(li)Active: Slow Fall

pages.title: Windstorm Staffs
pages.text: Duration, Power and Range of the effects depend on the tier of the staff.$(br)Wooden is the worst. Silver has good range, but weaker effects and moderate cooldown. Gold has abysmal range, but powerful effects with a long cooldown. Archmage is the best.
